QuestData.Title: Tracker Tracking
QuestData.Description:
We will require the aid of an expert tracker if we are to find the other Night Warriors.
The Wild Hunt possesses legendary skills in such matters. No quarry can elude them.
Speak with Lord Herne. With one of his hunters at your side, your search will surely be successful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lord Herne and locate the Wild Hunt tracker.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Search for the Horned Hunter at Root-Home.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, yes. I know of whom you speak.
